 2018-03142018-03-26,  ,  ,  ,  PS
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisReappointment of RENÉ ALLARD of Montréal, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years; and his designation as full-time member and Vice-Chairperson of the Appeal Division of the Parole Board of Canada.
